task.summary: excluded OMX-LI from build for now
replacing start() stop() with LOOPER_START LOOPER_STOP LOOPER_DISPATCH everywhere
wip: debugging camera controls (stubborn WHITE_BALANCE does not want to be set to 4000K) :(
removing WHITE_BALANCE_TEMPERATURE that is not supported on Logitech C270
camera parameters tweaks and more compact UI layout
wip: camera ordering. camera order written into /sdcard/com.zspace.perseus/cameras.txt
wip: ref_count-ed frames. release compiler optimizations
dispatch ref-counted frames to tracking algorithm; switched to r9d android ndk
wip: implementing sliding window for snapshot frames alignment to minimize jitter between frames (debug heavy version of code).
snapshot sliding window delivery with good results for lag, jitter and fps
more work on better lag and jitter of a snapshot
accommodate for driver dropped frames (resulting in duplicate timestamps) and simplify reorder()
used thread affinity to shorten camera stream_on lag
implemented moving averaging of stats for snapshot
experimental code (in progress) for very fast drawing of grayscale bits to the surface...
address to line number shell script
implemented direct draw of grayscale bitmaps to the surface
implemented and tested UVC camera USB reset - seems to work.
implemented and tested UVC camera USB reset - seems to work.
moved cameras code to its own package
moved open cameras to a single thread and execute them sequentially - fixed racing in the driver.
checked for memory leaks. None found. Proud. :)
small table view for Calypso-like ui
fast table views for Calypso-like ui
